about_the_game:
Just Ride DLC - Original Soundtrack
By purchasing this expansion pack, you will get a collection of all game background sound for Just Ride.

Track list

  • Desert Ambience LOOP.wav
  • KPM_KPM_0619_01201_BADLANDS_(A)_Clem__Clempson.wav
  • Lonely House LOOP.wav
  • Modern Dark LOOP.wav
  • Mozart symphony no40 in G minor,k.550.wav
  • mu_ALIEN_DISCOVERY_135bpm4-4_L40M_P17M.wav
  • mu_CRACKIN_DOWN_93bpm4-4_L24M_P1M.wav
  • mu_SIX_SHOOTER_142bpm4-4_L66M_P4M.wav
  • The Combat Collection Main Theme.wav
  • Very Sparse Piano LOOP NO BE.wav

  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 840M
